content: Zoom fatigue hitting different today? Your lips are the canary in the digital coal mineâ€”first to crack under endless video calls. Jesse A. Eisenbalm isn't just lip balm; it's your $8.99 investment in staying human when everything else is pixelated. Stop. Breathe. Apply. Let that smooth glide remind you there's a physical you beyond the webcam. While AI transcribes your meetings, this simple ritual keeps you grounded in the real world. Because authentic connections start with authentic self-care.
